description: Take beans on toast to the next level with this easy recipe, perfect for a tasty breakfast or simple supper. Each serving provides 427kcal, 21g protein, 68g carbohydrate (of which 18g sugars), 4g fat (of which 0.5g saturates), 16g fibre and 2.5g salt.

default: 200ml/7fl oz veg stock (using a stock cube)

steps: For the beans, combine all of the ingredients in a saucepan and season with salt and pepper. Bring to the boil, reduce to a simmer and cook uncovered for about 15 minutes until it has reduced to a nice sauce consistency.
Toast the bread, divide between serving plates and top with the beans.
title: Beans on toast
